astro.language-server.runtime.description: Path to the node executable used to execute the language server. You won't need this in most cases
astro.language-server.runtime.title: Language Server: Runtime

astro.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

astro.format.newLineAfterFrontmatter.description: Add a line return between the frontmatter and the template
astro.format.newLineAfterFrontmatter.deprecationMessage: The `astro.format` settings are deprecated. Formatting is now powered by Prettier and can be configured through a Prettier configuration file.
astro.format.newLineAfterFrontmatter.title: Formatting: Add line return after the frontmatter

astro.typescript.definitions.enabled.title: TypeScript: Go to Definition
astro.typescript.definitions.enabled.description: Enable go to definition for TypeScript

astro.typescript.signatureHelp.enabled.title: TypeScript: Signature Help
astro.typescript.signatureHelp.enabled.description: Enable signature help (parameter hints) for TypeScript

astro.typescript.rename.enabled.title: TypeScript: Rename
astro.typescript.rename.enabled.description: Enable rename functionality for JS/TS variables inside Astro files

astro.typescript.semanticTokens.enabled.title: TypeScript: Semantic Tokens
astro.typescript.semanticTokens.enabled.description: Enable semantic tokens (used for semantic highlighting) for TypeScript.

astro.typescript.allowArbitraryAttribute.title: TypeScript: Allow arbitrary attributes on HTML elements
astro.typescript.allowArbitraryAttribute.description: Enable the usage of non-standard HTML attributes, such as the ones added by AlpineJS or petite-vue

astro.language-server.ls-path.description: Path to the language server executable. You won't need this in most cases, set this only when needing a specific version of the language server
astro.language-server.ls-path.title: Language Server: Path

astro.format.indentFrontmatter.description: Indent the formatter by one level of indentation
astro.format.indentFrontmatter.deprecationMessage: The `astro.format` settings are deprecated. Formatting is now powered by Prettier and can be configured through a Prettier configuration file.
astro.format.indentFrontmatter.title: Formatting: Indent frontmatter
